name: David Duff
text: They always do a great job! Everyone should attend one of their concerts.

name: Richard Frank
text: Thougts is one of the highlights of living in Mobile. We just love the Symphony!

name: John Purser
text: Great organization! I've been a member of the Mobile Symphony now for almost 18 years and I've loved every moment of it. One of the best orchestras I've had the honor to play with hands down! Very professional and exciting programs.

name: Verna Richard
text: I was hired in 2005 and I'm proud to be a dedicated employee of Mobile Symphony. The MSO has definitely made a difference by providing great music. But I'm most proud of our Education Programs in partner schools in Mobile and Baldwin county. #thecounter

name: Cooper “CooperZMan” Tate
text: Top notch orchestra based on the gulf coast in a beautiful theatre.

name: Ginny Phillips Allen
text: Amazing sensitivity to nuance, balance with vocal soloisr, variety in orchestration, high caliber musicians. Great musicians with profound musicianship!

name: Kenneth “Kenny the Clown” Kahn
text: Amazing place. Great ambience. Great acoustics. Very helpful staff.

name: Michael G
text: The Alabama Symphony continues to provide Alabama with a top-notch, professional and expressive body of musicians under the incredible leadership of Carlos Izcaray. We are so lucky to have this group enriching our artistic culture in central Alabama. If you haven't been out to see them yet, you are seriously missing out. Talented soloists all, incredible guest artists, and a wonderful volunteer choir make for a formidable entity that needs our continued support. Student tickets have been and hopefully always will be just $10!

name: Dr. Cherie Johnson
text: I absolutely love the ASO.  They have phenomenal guest performers at their POP series.  My child loves the symphony and it is a joy we can bring her to these concerts. Venues are great, performances are wonderful, and choices of music are outstanding.  Thanks ASO for all your hard work!

name: Rochelle Simms
text: We have subscribed to the ASO Super Pops concerts for several years.  We have enjoyed every performance we have attended.  The most recent one was on February 29, 2020 when the orchestra paid tribute to Nat King Cole. The guest performer, Denzal Sinclaire was OUTSTANDING! Hearing him sing "Mona Lisa" was in itself worth the cost of a ticket.

name: Katherine McNeill
text: We are blessed to have this amazing orchestra giftung us this both pops and classical offerings. Plus, many educational oporunities
